sources.name: CBC News
sources.description: CBC News is the division of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation responsible for the news gathering and production of news programs on the corporation's English-language operations, namely CBC Television, CBC Radio, CBC News Network, and CBC.ca.

sources.name: Financial Post
sources.description: Find the latest happenings in the Canadian Financial Sector and stay up to date with changing trends in Business Markets. Read trading and investing advice from professionals.

sources.name: Google News (Canada)
sources.description: Comprehensive, up-to-date Canada news coverage, aggregated from sources all over the world by Google News.

sources.name: The Globe And Mail
sources.description: The Globe and Mail offers the most authoritative news in Canada, featuring national and international news.
